ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Solar Orbiter (SOLO) Solar Wind Analyser (SWA), Heavy Ion Sensor (HIS) Composition, Level 3 (L3), 10 min Data Resolution

RevisionEvent.Note: Updated ResourceID to include complex naming authority, and corrected typo in a PersonID name.

ResourceHeader.Description: Level 3 data for SWA-HIS instrument. Time series measurements of the elemental abundance, charge state composition, and kinetic properties of heavy ions in the solar wind. This data is appropriate for general scientific use. Users are encouraged to read both the Data Product Description Document and Heavy Ion Sensor (HIS) usage notes, and pay attention to the quality flag. Please, contact the SWA/HIS team for more information and questions about the data.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Chris J. Owen (SWA PI -- UCL MSSL) & Stefano Livi (HIS PI -- SwRI). NASA Contract NNG10EK25C.

InformationURL.Name: Solar Orbiter SWA reference webpage with DOI information
Owen C.J. et al., The Solar Orbiter Solar Wind Analyser (SWA) Suite, A&A, 642 (2020) A16

AccessURL.Name: Solar Orbiter Archive (SOAR) web interface
AccessURL.Description: Solar Orbiter Archive (SOAR) European Space Agency web interface

AccessURL.Name: Solar Orbiter Archive (SOAR) TAP
AccessURL.Description: Solar Orbiter Data and Metadata via the European Space Agency Table Access Protocol (TAP) server

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to ASCII, CDF, and Plots via NASA/GSFC CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Chris J. Owen (SWA PI -- UCL MSSL) and Stefano Livi (HIS PI -- SwRI). Please acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these Data.

NumericalData.Caveats: Prior to January 2022, noise levels in the HIS energy detector subsystem were high enough to produce significant artifacts in the data much of the time. These artifacts interfere with the accurate assignment of specific ions counts as well impact the quality filtering of the data using HIS team's current automated algorithms. Much of this data may be useful for scientific studies, however it requires substantially more manual validation. For this reason, it is not included in the released data products. Researchers investigating events prior to 2022 should contact the HIS team. It may be possible to provide composition data for specific short periods after manual validation and quality filtering.

Parameter.Name: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Default time. Time in nanoseconds since January 1, 2000, 12:00:00.000. Converted using time correlation SCET via SPICE time kernel provided by the mission. Currently set to start of accumulation interval.

Parameter.Name: EPOCH STOP
Parameter.Description: Default time. Time in nanoseconds since January 1, 2000, 12:00:00.000. Converted using time correlation SCET via SPICE time kernel provided by the mission. Currently set to stop of accumulation interval.

Parameter.Name: Accumulation time
Parameter.Description: The summed accumulation time for this time step, equal to the total measurement time for each elevation step throughout the accumulated scans, less measurement time from elevation steps that have not passed quality filtering.

Parameter.Name: Quality Flag
Parameter.Description: Quality flag: 0=good, 1=caution (nonzero Quality Bitmask), 2=bad (data may be available, contact instrument team)
Parameter.Caveats: Data which has potential quality issues but is not clearly of low quality is marked with a quality_flag value of 1. Data with this designation may suffer from low-count effects and/or incomplete velocity coverage of the O6+ distribution.

Parameter.Name: Quality Bitmask
Parameter.Description: Quality bitmask: Bit 1 = substantially shorter time accumulation, bit 2 = unavailable or highly varying PAS proton solar wind speed, bit 3 = unavailable or inaccurate SSD filtering.

Parameter.Name: Azimuth Source
Parameter.Description: Azimuth source: 0 = Azimuth from SSD Detector; 1 = Azimuth from the position on the Start MCP

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind Type
Parameter.Description: Solar wind type. 0:Streamer, 1:Coronal hole, 2:CME, 3:Unidentified

Parameter.Name: Number of Scans
Parameter.Description: Number of scans accumulated for data products.

Parameter.Name: He++ Density
Parameter.Description: He++ density

Parameter.Name: He++ Density Error/uncertainty
Parameter.Description: He++ density error/uncertainty. Estimate of uncertainty associated with species separation and counting statistics.

Parameter.Name: He++ Density Quality Flag
Parameter.Description: He++ density quality flag: Quality Flag: 0=good, 1=caution (due to high uncertainty and/or record-level quality flag), 2=bad (data may be available, contact instrument team).

Parameter.Name: Oxygen Charge Distribution
Parameter.Description: Oxygen charge distribution for charges 5, 6, 7, 8. The individual, unitless, relative abundances reflect the fraction of the total oxygen 5-8+ abundance.

Parameter.Name: Oxygen Charge Distribution Error/uncertainty
Parameter.Description: "Estimate of uncertainty associated with species separation and counting statistics. For charges 5, 6, 7, 8.

Parameter.Name: Oxygen Charge Distribution Quality Flag
Parameter.Description: Oxygen charge distribution quality flag: 0=good, 1=caution (due to high uncertainty and/or record-level quality flag), 2=bad (data may be available, contact instrument team).

Parameter.Name: Carbon Charge Distribution
Parameter.Description: Carbon charge distribution for charges 4, 5, 6. The individual, unitless, relative abundances reflect the fraction of the total carbon 4-6+ abundance.

Parameter.Description: Estimate of uncertainty associated with species separation and counting statistics. For charges 4, 5, 6.

Parameter.Name: Carbon Charge Distribution Quality Flag
Parameter.Description: Carbon charge distribution quality flag: 0=good, 1=caution (due to high uncertainty and/or record-level quality flag), 2=bad (data may be available, contact instrument team).

Parameter.Name: Iron Charge Distribution
Parameter.Description: Iron charge distribution for charges 6 through 20. The individual, unitless, relative abundances reflect the fraction of the total iron 6-20+ abundance.

Parameter.Name: Iron Charge Distribution Error/uncertainty
Parameter.Description: Estimate of uncertainty associated with species separation and counting statistics. For charges 6 through 20.

Parameter.Name: Iron Charge Distribution Error Quality Flag
Parameter.Description: Iron charge distribution quality flag: 0=good, 1=caution (due to high uncertainty and/or record-level quality flag), 2=bad (data may be available, contact instrument team).

Parameter.Name: Silicon Charge Distribution Quality Flag
Parameter.Description: Silicon charge distribution quality flag: 0=good, 1=caution (due to high uncertainty and/or record-level quality flag), 2=bad (data may be available, contact instrument team).

Parameter.Name: Neon Charge Distribution Quality Flag
Parameter.Description: Neon charge distribution quality flag: 0=good, 1=caution (due to high uncertainty and/or record-level quality flag), 2=bad (data may be available, contact instrument team).

Parameter.Name: Nitrogen Charge Distribution

Parameter.Name: Nitrogen Charge Distribution Quality Flag
Parameter.Description: Nitrogen charge distribution quality flag: 0=good, 1=caution (due to high uncertainty and/or record-level quality flag), 2=bad (data may be available, contact instrument team).
